name: Idle Arena:The Five Realms
description:
【AFK】
The one-click battle, free your hands; No worries about the development resources you missed due to the busy work because there is one-click resource recovery."

【Plenty of Heroes】
Over 100 heroes in five factions, summon the heroes you like to build your battle array.

【Factions restraint 】
Strategy is the key, using your minds to win the battles. Due to the mutual restraint between the five factions, it requires you to understand the attributes and skills of the hero and formulate strategy."

【Time-saving】
Training, tower climbing, and battles can be carried out at the same time, but the most wonderful thing is that you can level up and farm even when sleeping, free your hands completely.

【PVP and PVE】
Multiple arenas and dungeons are waiting for the warriors; Show your muscle to get those rare training resources.

【Global Game】
Communicate and compete with gamers around the world, fighting for champions in different arenas.

SUPPORT

If you encounter any issues during the game, you can send us feedback via the in-game Customer Service Center.
Customer Service Email: cs@kuukigame.com
Official Site: http://www.kuukigame.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IdleGame2021
Discord: https://discord.gg/hDxaAKH2wS
